module.name: document_definition
module.keywords: module module, document definition, physical document definition, digital document definition

purpose.p: The Document assignment application module supports the requirement to assign documents to objects. The application module also supports the requirement to assign part or sections of documents to objects.

inscope.li: Assignment of parts or sections of documents to objects.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of assigning documents to objects.

description.p: The Document_Definition UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of representing a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using different formats.
